mapper.sql: SELECT wholesale_record_id, order_number, product_name, internal_product_code, quantity, consignee, contact_number, detailed_address, date, remarks, express_fee, logistics_cost, brand_owner, ordering_party, purchase_price, purchase_freight, purchase_other_costs, purchase_total, purchase_inspection, purchase_status, purchase_remarks, delivery_price, delivery_freight, delivery_other_costs, delivery_total, delivery_inspection, delivery_status, delivery_remarks, profit, shipment_code FROM wholesale_record
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wholesale_record ( order_number, product_name, internal_product_code, quantity, consignee, contact_number, detailed_address, date, remarks, express_fee, logistics_cost, brand_owner, ordering_party, purchase_price, purchase_freight, purchase_other_costs, purchase_total, purchase_inspection, purchase_status, purchase_remarks, delivery_price, delivery_freight, delivery_other_costs, delivery_total, delivery_inspection, delivery_status, delivery_remarks, profit, shipment_code, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNumber}, #{productName}, #{internalProductCode}, #{quantity}, #{consignee}, #{contactNumber}, #{detailedAddress}, #{date}, #{remarks}, #{expressFee}, #{logisticsCost}, #{brandOwner}, #{orderingParty}, #{purchasePrice}, #{purchaseFreight}, #{purchaseOtherCosts}, #{purchaseTotal}, #{purchaseInspection}, #{purchaseStatus}, #{purchaseRemarks}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{deliveryFreight}, #{deliveryOtherCosts}, #{deliveryTotal}, #{deliveryInspection}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{deliveryRemarks}, #{profit}, #{shipmentCode}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM wholesale_record WHERE wholesale_record_id IN
#{wholesaleRecordId}
